FileFormat.FormatDescription: The FLExText Interlinear XML format is used in the field of linguistics study. FlExText is produced by SIL International’s FieldWorks software, and can be imported to other programs such as ELAN and SayMore.
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: 04/2024 (v.118)- Offset from BOF changed from 0 to 0-3 to provide flexibility for the XML 1.0 declaration. Submitted by Preservica based on samples provided by The Endanagered Languages Archive.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF offset 0-3, XML 1.0 declaration, then mandatory elements, ‘document’, ‘interlinear-text’, ‘paragraphs’– see https://github.com/sillsdev/FieldWorks/blob/develop/DistFiles/Language%20Explorer/Export%20Templates/Interlinear/FlexInterlinear.xsd. There are additional non-mandatory elements and attributes that can appear, which may mean that relative offsets between elements may need to be tweaked further.
